participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and dedicated, Emily often finds joy in her passions, whether it’s accounting or her love for gummy bears.
participant_1.background: I love gummy bears and never had kids. My idol is Thierry Henry. I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family. I want to be a museum curator. I have freckles all over my face.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and creative, Jake has a knack for photography and a love for the great outdoors.
participant_2.background: I bought my first bike with the money I earned mowing lawns. I put on my favorite pair of jeans made from recycled plastic bottles. I love RPG computer games. I have trained over 20 types of animals. I want to share my photography with the world.

content.text: Hey there! What do you do for a living?
I am a photographer and I share my work with the world!
That's awesome! What is your favorite genre to shoot?
I love shooting nature! The outdoors is my happy place. What about you?
I'm an accountant for a big corporation. Not as exciting as photography, but it pays the bills.
I am sure it does! Accounts are very important!
Thanks! I agree! What do you like to do in your free time?
I love playing RPG computer games and training animals. I've trained over 20 different species!
That's really cool! I love RPG games too. Do you play any of the new ones?
I don't have the time to play them all, but I'm always up for trying new ones. I'm playing a lot of New World right now. What about you?
I'm playing a lot of Final Fantasy XIV. It's a lot of fun!
I've heard good things about it. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's one of the best MMORPGs out there
